entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:17 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:17 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
